channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023061593
item.description:
Report X-2023061593

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg made its way to the destination/delivery terminal where it was found to be damaged and the delivery driver refused to deliver the pkg. A Damage Package Report was filed improperly and no other required reports were filed before the pkg was Return To Shipper by the terminal. Pkg was stopped at this location due to wet and partially open bottom closures as well as fading on the barcode label from the fumes of the leaked chemical. Pkg was placed sideways in an unlined unauthorized plastic bin and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and properly handling/reporting of the pkg. DescribePack: A loose cap allowed liquid to leak from the 1 x 20 L plastic bag. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in unlined unauthorized plastic bin.

item.title: Report X-2023061584
item.description:
Report X-2023061584

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023061584 SequenceEvent: A loose cap allowed liquid to leak during transit/sortation wetting the carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin (another damaged Hazmat was also in the bin) and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Cause of damage was the leaking liquid from the loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. 2. X-2023061591 SequenceEvent: Loose caps allowed liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023061486
item.description:
Report X-2023061486

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-16
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet deteriorating package was put aside on BELT 2 in the afternoon on 6/16. Picked up by QA and brought to inspect. Recognized label as corrossive and brought to Hazmat cage to contain and process. DescribePack: 4 Gallons each had some liquid missing/leaked DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: put in yellow drum and sealed for processing

item.title: Report X-2023061271
item.description:
Report X-2023061271

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was found wet and placed in a lined Hazmat bin that was taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: After pkg was dropped it began to leak. Inspection found the bottle completely shattered. Some liquid was absorbed by the carton. There is no clean up material with the damaged pkg. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin with a leaking and damaged Corrosive (Ltd Qty) pkg.
